I've played arround with it and got the NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule
working. It seems to be an issue with the static-block when registering
the keys. I've placed the key registration at the end of each decide
rule and this seems to fix the problems with the decide rules. The keys
for ContentTypeMatchesRegExpDecideRule are also shown in the web-ui (->
HER-1479).

I think, the Key-Registration-Code is also needed, if the keys are
inherited from super class, so they are populated to the KeyManager for
the class itself and not only for the superclasses. I think this is the
main cause of the issue.

Gordon, it whould be very helpful if the described changes were made to
the actual stable and if a bug fix release would be made available soon
via svn and maven2. Additionally to HER-1479 and HER-1517 the bugs
HER-1496, HER-1501 and some other known bugs may be fixed in this realease.

Have a nice day
Christian


Gordon Mohr schrieb:
> You've hit a bug in Heritrix2. I've just tried adding a 
> NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule to the global sheet of our default 
> profiles; the expected additional settings do not appear. I've created 
> an issue in our tracking system:
> 
> http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-1517
> 
> As the user manual and some other material written by other users about 
> doing HTML-only crawls is all focused on Heritrix 1.X versions, and as a 
> newbie, you may want to use Heritrix 1.14 instead. Unless you need 
> Heritrix2 features, it's a better-documented and more fully tested 
> choice, for now.
> 
> - Gordon @ IA
> 
> 
> nickbirren wrote:
>> Hi
>>
>> I'm trying to fetch only html pages. I read in the manual's appendix
>> that this can be done by using NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule - but
>> when I add it to the job's sheet I get no options to configure it
>> (provide it with a .*(/|\.html)$ regexp). There's nothing in the job's
>> sheet that would let me provide any parameters for this decide rule.
>>
>> Any help would be much appreciated
>>
>> Thanks
>> -N
>>
